scripts.install-precommit:
if [ -f .git/hooks/pre-commit ]; then echo 'Not overwriting .git/hooks/pre-commit'; else echo '#!/bin/sh
yarn --silent run precommit' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit; echo 'Added .git/hooks/pre-commit'; fi
scripts.lint:
echo '
[1mprettier[0m' && prettier . --check && echo '
[1mtsc[0m' && tsc --noEmit && echo '
[1meslint[0m' && eslint --ext .js,.ts,.tsx . && echo ''
scripts.lint-fix:
echo '
[1mprettier[0m' && prettier --write . && echo '
[1mtsc[0m' && tsc --noEmit && echo '
[1meslint[0m' && eslint --ext .js,.ts,.tsx . --fix && echo ''
scripts.lint-precommit: if [[ -n $(git ls-files . --exclude-standard --others --modified) || $GIT_INDEX_FILE != '.git/index' ]]; then yarn --silent run lint; else (yarn --silent run lint-fix && git add -A); fi;
